QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(l.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, cast(replace(l.encid, 'E0000','') as bigint) as VisitOccurrenceId, ec.provid, test_name, result_date, result_time, CASE WHEN relative_indicator = '<=' THEN 4171754 WHEN relative_indicator = '>=' THEN 4171755 WHEN relative_indicator = '<' THEN 4171756 WHEN relative_indicator = '=' THEN 4172703 WHEN relative_indicator = '>' THEN 4172704 ELSE NULL END as OperatorConceptId, CASE WHEN lower(test_result) = 'few' THEN 45878239 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'np' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'none' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'none seen' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'none see' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'negative' THEN 45878583 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'abnormal' THEN 45878745 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'present' THEN 45879438 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'pos' THEN 45879438 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'rare' THEN 45880295 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'trace' THEN 45881796 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'positive' THEN 45884084 WHEN lower(test_result) = 'absent' THEN 45884086 ELSE NULL END AS ValueAsConceptId, test_result, result_unit, normal_range, 'oncology' source_type from {sc}.labs l JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT JOIN {sc}.encounter_provider as ec ON ec.encid = l.encid where l.encid is not NULL and l.encid != '' order by cast(replace(l.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
